text: I'm looking for a cheap Chinese restaurant in Cambridge. Do you have any recommendations?

I can recommend a few options for a cheap Chinese restaurant in Cambridge.

You can try:

- "rice house" located at 88 Mill Road City Centre, postcode CB12BD. They offer a variety of Chinese dishes at a moderate price.
- "charlie chan" located at Regent Street City Centre, postcode CB21DB. They offer a range of Chinese dishes at a cheap price.
- "peking restaurant" located at 10 Homerton Street City Centre, postcode CB28NX. They offer a variety of Chinese dishes at an expensive price, but you can try their set menu which might be more affordable.
- "hk fusion" located at 21 Burleigh Street City Centre, postcode CB11DG. They offer a range of Chinese dishes at an expensive price, but you can try their lunch menu which might be more affordable.
- "hk fusion" located at 21 Burleigh Street City Centre, postcode CB11DG. They offer a range of Chinese dishes at an expensive price, but you can try their lunch menu which might be more affordable.
- "tang chinese" located at Napier Street City Centre, postcode CB11HR. They offer a range of Chinese dishes at an expensive price, but you can try their set menu which might be more affordable.

Please note that prices may vary depending on the location and time of day.
